name: Unbabel
headline: AI-powered Language Operations platform
description:
Unbabel is an AI Centric Language Operations Platform that eliminates language barriers so that businesses can grow across markets. Our platform enables anyone to easily create flexible translation pipelines for any language or type of content in a scalable way. The pipelines combine best in class AI components, such as our Machine Translation and Quality Estimation, with different levels of human-in-the-loop capabilities, such as human translation and human annotations. The result is an easy to use, super scalable platform for Language Operations that can easily go from real time translation using adapted machine translation to high end human transcreation. 

Based in San Francisco, Unbabel works with hundreds of businesses such as Lego, Logitech, Microsoft, Warner Bros, Virgin Pulse, Booking.com or Under Armour, to communicate effortlessly with customers around the world, no matter what language they speak.

founders.name: Vasco Pedro, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Vasco Pedro is a co-founder and chief executive officer of Unbabel, a company that removes language barriers by blending artificial intelligence with real-time, human translations. A serial entrepreneur, Vasco has led Unbabel since 2013, taking it through Y Combinator and raising a total of $100 million in funding.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Unbabel**

Founded in 2013 and based in San Francisco, Unbabel stands out as an innovative player in the field of translations with its AI-powered Language Operations platform. Initially launched as a startup in Y Combinator’s Batch W14, Unbabel has consistently aimed to break down language barriers, empowering businesses to communicate seamlessly across global markets.

**Mission and Vision**

Unbabel's mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to eliminate language barriers and facilitate growth for businesses worldwide. Their AI-centric platform offers a flexible translation service that can scale to meet any business's content needs—from real-time translations using advanced machine learning to nuanced human transcreation.

**How It Works**

At the core of Unbabel’s offering is its unique translation pipeline. This system synergizes AI-powered machine translation enhancements, such as Quality Estimation, with human expertise, allowing for a mix of automated and human-in-the-loop translation processes. This dual approach enables companies to easily adjust their translation strategies based on the demands of different content types and target markets.

**Target Audience and Clientele**

Unbabel serves a diverse array of industries, including gaming, retail, technology, and travel. They have successfully partnered with notable brands like Lego, Microsoft, and Warner Bros, showcasing their capability to handle translation challenges for high-profile clients.

**Team and Location**

With a growing team of approximately 350 employees, the company is well-positioned in the competitive landscape of language services. The San Francisco Bay Area location not only anchors Unbabel in a rich ecosystem of tech innovation but also connects them with potential partners and customers across the globe.

**Technology and Integrations**

What sets Unbabel apart is its robust integration capabilities. The platform connects smoothly with popular business tools like Salesforce, Zendesk, and Intercom, ensuring that translation can be embedded directly into existing workflows without disrupting operations. This approach minimizes onboarding time and maximizes productivity.

**Commitment to Quality and Security**

Unbabel emphasizes the importance of translation quality, providing clients with insights into their performance through advanced quality estimation tools. Moreover, the company prioritizes data security, having established ISO 27001 certified protocols to safeguard customer information.

**Final Thoughts**

If you're looking for a partner to enhance your global communication efforts, Unbabel presents a compelling case. Their fusion of AI technology with human oversight creates a scalable, efficient, and cost-effective solution for any business eager to expand its reach without the friction of language barriers. For more information, you can visit their website at [unbabel.com](http://unbabel.com).
